name: Walking Corpse
description: You raise a humanoid corpse into an undead creature that is of the grunt tier by placing two malachite in the eye sockets. The undead creature that you choose must have a physical form and be the same size as the corpse. This effect is permanent with the target of this spell being in a constant maddened state unless controlled by the Command Undead action.
charge: You can raise the humanoid into a standard level creature instead.
